title: Crypto Exchanges Have a Plan to Beat Binance
itunes:title: Crypto Exchanges Have a Plan to Beat Binance
description:
Dr. Rhonda Medows, President of Health Management at Providence St. Joseph Health, discusses getting people access to Covid vaccines. Bloomberg Businessweek Editor Joel Weber and Bloomberg News Finance Reporter Katherine Chiglinsky talk about how some cryptocurrency exchanges are embracing regulation. Bloomberg New Economy Editorial Director Andy Browne explains that TikTok owner ByteDance is working to ensure it complies with data security requirements after meetings with Chinese government officials. And we Drive to the Close with Brian Jacobsen, Multi-Asset Strategist at Wells Fargo Asset Management.

Host: Carol Massar and Tim Stenovec. Producer: Paul Brennan.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
